verses.verse: Behold, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh makes the earth <S%H776><s%> empty, <S%H1238><s%> makes it waste, <S%H1110><s%> turns <S%H5753><s%> it upside down, <S%H6440><s%> and scatters <S%H6327><s%> its inhabitants. <S%H3427><s%>

It will be as with the people, <S%H5971><s%> so with the priest; <S%H3548><s%> as with the servant, <S%H5650><s%> so with his master; <S%H113><s%> as with the maid, <S%H8198><s%> so with her mistress; <S%H1404><s%> as with the buyer, <S%H7069><s%> so with the seller; <S%H4376><s%> as with the creditor, <S%H3867><s%> so with the debtor; <S%H3867><s%> as with the taker of interest, <S%H5383><s%> so <S%H834><s%> with the giver of interest. <S%H5378><s%>
The earth <S%H776><s%> will be utterly <S%H1238><s%> emptied <S%H1238><s%> and utterly <S%H962><s%> laid waste; <S%H962><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> this word. <S%H1697><s%>

The earth <S%H776><s%> mourns <S%H56><s%> and fades away. <S%H5034><s%> The world <S%H8398><s%> languishes <S%H535><s%> and fades away. <S%H5034><s%> The lofty <S%H4791><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> languish. <S%H535><s%>

The earth <S%H776><s%> also is polluted <S%H2610><s%> under its inhabitants, <S%H3427><s%> because they have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> the laws, <S%H8451><s%> violated <S%H2498><s%> the statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and broken <S%H6565><s%> the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

Therefore the curse <S%H423><s%> has devoured <S%H398><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein are found guilty. <S%H816><s%> Therefore the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> are burned, <S%H2787><s%> and few <S%H4213><s%> men <S%H582><s%> left. <S%H7604><s%>
The new wine <S%H8492><s%> mourns. <S%H56><s%> The vine <S%H1612><s%> languishes. <S%H535><s%> All the merry-hearted <S%H8056><s%> sigh. <S%H584><s%>

The mirth <S%H4885><s%> of tambourines <S%H8596><s%> ceases. <S%H7673><s%> The sound <S%H7588><s%> of those who rejoice <S%H5947><s%> ends. <S%H2308><s%> The joy <S%H4885><s%> of the harp <S%H3658><s%> ceases. <S%H7673><s%>
They will not drink <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> with a song. <S%H7892><s%> Strong drink <S%H7941><s%> will be bitter <S%H4843><s%> to those who drink it. <S%H8354><s%>
The confused <S%H8414><s%> city <S%H7151><s%> is broken down. <S%H7665><s%> Every house <S%H1004><s%> is shut up, <S%H5462><s%> that no man may come in. <S%H935><s%>

There is a crying <S%H6682><s%> in the streets <S%H2351><s%> because of the wine. <S%H3196><s%> All joy <S%H8057><s%> is darkened. <S%H6150><s%> The mirth <S%H4885><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> is gone. <S%H1540><s%>
The city <S%H5892><s%> is left <S%H7604><s%> in desolation, <S%H8047><s%> and the gate <S%H8179><s%> is struck <S%H3807><s%> with destruction. <S%H7591><s%>

For it will be so in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> as the shaking <S%H5363><s%> of an olive tree, <S%H2132><s%> as the gleanings <S%H5955><s%> when the vintage <S%H1210><s%> is done. <S%H3615><s%>

These shall lift up <S%H5375><s%> their voice. <S%H6963><s%> They will shout <S%H7442><s%> for the majesty <S%H1347><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> They cry aloud <S%H6670><s%> from the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

Therefore glorify <S%H3513><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in the east, <S%H217><s%> even the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> in the islands <S%H339><s%> of the sea! <S%H3220><s%>

From the uttermost part <S%H3671><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> have we heard <S%H8085><s%> songs. <S%H2158><s%> Glory <S%H6643><s%> to the righteous! <S%H6662><s%> But I said, <S%H559><s%> "I pine <S%H7334><s%> away! <S%H7334><s%> I pine away! <S%H188><s%> woe is me! <S%H898><s%>" The treacherous have dealt treacherously. <S%H898><s%> Yes, <S%H898><s%> the treacherous have dealt very <S%H899><s%> treacherously. <S%H898><s%>
Fear, <S%H6343><s%> the pit, <S%H6354><s%> and the snare, <S%H6341><s%> are on you who inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

It will happen that he who flees <S%H5127><s%> from the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the fear <S%H6343><s%> will fall <S%H5307><s%> into the pit; <S%H6354><s%> and he who comes up <S%H5927><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the pit <S%H6354><s%> will be taken <S%H3920><s%> in the snare; <S%H6341><s%> for the windows <S%H699><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%> are opened, <S%H6605><s%> and the foundations <S%H4146><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> tremble. <S%H7493><s%>

The earth <S%H776><s%> is utterly <S%H7489><s%> broken. <S%H7489><s%> The earth <S%H776><s%> is torn <S%H6565><s%> apart. <S%H6565><s%> The earth <S%H776><s%> is shaken <S%H4131><s%> violently. <S%H4131><s%>

The earth <S%H776><s%> will stagger <S%H5128><s%> like a drunken <S%H7910><s%> man, <S%H5128><s%> and will sway back and forth <S%H5110><s%> like a hammock. <S%H4412><s%> Its disobedience <S%H6588><s%> will be heavy <S%H3513><s%> on it, <S%H5307><s%> and it will fall and not rise <S%H6965><s%> again. <S%H3254><s%>

It shall happen in that day <S%H3117><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will punish <S%H6485><s%> the army <S%H6635><s%> of the high ones <S%H4791><s%> on high, <S%H4791><s%> and the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%> on the earth. <S%H127><s%>

They shall be gathered together, <S%H622><s%> as prisoners <S%H616><s%> are gathered <S%H626><s%> in the pit, <S%H953><s%> and shall be shut up <S%H5462><s%> in the prison; <S%H4525><s%> and after many <S%H7230><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall they be visited. <S%H6485><s%>

Then the moon <S%H3842><s%> shall be confounded, <S%H2659><s%> and the sun <S%H2535><s%> ashamed; <S%H954><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> will reign <S%H4427><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and in Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> and before his elders <S%H2205><s%> will be glory. <S%H3519><s%>
